instructions:
Boil potatoes in skins for about 35 minutes or until tender. Peel and slice potatoes into a bowl. Then add
celery, onion, cucumber, olives, celery seed, salt and pepper. Stir mustard into salad dressing and drizzle
over vegetables. Toss and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Add sliced eggs, stir in Miracle Whip and serve.
Additional Miracle Whip may be stirred in if more moist salad is desired. 
*(Rev. 6/23/95)*
name: Potato Salad
creator: Mary Decker
